document.full_text: hamas said egypt had agreed to allow 550 people a day to leave gaza through the rafah border and to lengthen the operating hours of the crossing.
document.title: middle east: egypt and hamas reach accord on rafah crossing
lines_and_colors: hamas said egypt had agreed to allow 550 people a day to leave gaza through the rafah border and to lengthen the operating hours of the crossing.
